colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DUR BED NAS DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA NANG SO SKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS AU TSUGS MTHAR SKYEL GYIS BSKUL BA'I GA-YAR NGO MA BZLOG PAR, LHA 'DRE STONG GI DRA BA LAS 'BYUNG BA DANG SGO BSTUN TE GU S'A LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS NOR SKYONG RAB BRGAL TSUL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI NGAG DBANG @013B BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA RIS MED YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
